name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **ETL** processes. Proficient in handling data formats such as **CSV**, **XML**, and **JSON**, along with deep expertise in **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases. Skilled in designing robust applications that ensure data integrity and compliance.
Demonstrated ability to build and maintain high-performance applications across various industries, particularly in healthcare and finance. Experienced in employing **Docker** for containerized applications and utilizing **Kafka** for real-time data processing.
Adept in developing microservices and constructing efficient **Spring Batch** infrastructures, ensuring agile data workflows. Strong communicator with exceptional **Technical English** skills, capable of collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams.

Utilized comprehensive technical English communication skills to document workflows and specifications, ensuring clarity in cross-team collaborations.
Implemented rigorous testing strategies across all layers using tools such as JUnit and Mockito, achieving over **90% test coverage** for critical application modules.
Led migration efforts from monolithic applications to microservices architectures, utilizing **Docker** and orchestration tools to improve system modularity and fault tolerance.
Facilitated knowledge sharing sessions on **Spring Boot** and cloud-native development, mentoring junior engineers and enhancing team capabilities.
